main.name: Thomas Bui
main.description: Long-time educator with experience living and working abroad.  Making a career transition towards software development and engineering.
main.bio: Tech enthusiast with a strong background working in education.  8+ years in education, with 5 years spent teaching in Japan.  Hobbyist programmer for many years using python and C++.  Self taught topics in the past year include computer graphics, web development, databases, machine learning. Currently fascinated by compilers and interpreters.  Hobbies outside of work and programming include runnning, calisthenics, and learning about nutrition.
